name: HeadHunter (itch) (Sonicboomcolt)
description:
Note: I had a few days interrupted so the game is short due to this.

HeadHunter is a well known killer, he was tasked to kill two high level leaders within the group named C-U-R-D. HeadHunter has killed the second leader in command, Duk-3000, He has been tasked to kill Curds the main leader.

A & DMove left and rightSpacebarJump
Left MouseShoot

Programming/Music/Models - Danyon "Sonicboomcolt" Huntington
Textures - Substance Painter & ambientCG.com
Sounds - Danyon "Sonicboomcolt" Huntington & Freesound.org
